Wordless (save for the song "Walking in the Air")
animated adventure about a young English boy who
makes a snowman one Christmas Eve, only for it to
come to life that night and take him on a magical
adventure to the North Pole to meet Santa Claus.

The Snowman and the Snowdog [2012]
Code: <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2560206/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2560206/</a>  (24mins)

A young boy whose dog has just died moves into the house
in whose backyard the snowman was built. Finding a
photograph of the snowman the boy rebuilds him,fashioning
a snow dog out of the excess snow. The trio fly off in a
plane to meet Santa,who gives the boy a magical dog collar
which will make it the happiest Christmas ever for him.
